channel.title: Helvanica
channel.description:
Hello runescape players! I am here to show you about our RSPS called 'Helvanica'.
Helvanica has a history of being called "Project 69" which was founded in 2009. This year we have changed the name to Helvanica. Our aim is to make a nice server where people can enjoy themselves and make friends. We don't have alot of players anymore due to technical issues, but we can get this up again with your help!
[B][I] What do we offer?[/I][/B]
We offer a lot of things.
Domination Arena, Prestige System, Housing System, Zooming feature, Achievements, Player owned shops, An original home, A great staff team with 2+years of experience, A friendly community and much more!
[B][I][U]1 of the 6 possible houses[/U][/I][/B] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2qsqm9t.png[/img]
[B][I][U]Prestige System[/U][/I][/B] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/a1k303.png[/img]
[B][I][U]Torva & Primal[/U][/I][/B] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2lc2rsw.png[/img]
[B][I][U]Player owned shops[/U][/I][/B] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/dq1uz9.png[/img]
[B][I][U]Active staff[/U][/I][/B] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/25ist8k.png[/img]
Come visit us now! Link to Webclient: [url=http://helvanica.com/webclient.html]http://helvanica.com/webclient.html[/url] To download our Client: [url=http://helvanica.com/index.php?pageid=howtoplay]http://helvanica.com/index.php?pageid=howtoplay[/url]

item.title: Helvanica
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

sandy15:

The Donator capes are just simply me showing some of the more expensive items we have in store.

Okay so, even if you aren’t a donator you can still obtain it?

Read full topic

The Donator capes are just simply me showing some of the more expensive items we have in store.

item.title: Helvanica
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:5, topic:454154”]okay then better question,

  1. why is a donor cape allowed to be sold to regular players from a pos?

also, therein again, a pos allows you to set YOUR OWN PRICES. So it still voids back to what I said.[/quote]

You are right, you shouldn’t have the ability to sell a donator cape in a PoS.

Read full topic

item.title: Helvanica
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

okay then better question,

  1. why is a donor cape allowed to be sold to regular players from a pos?

also, therein again, a pos allows you to set YOUR OWN PRICES. So it still voids back to what I said.

item.title: Helvanica
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:3, topic:454154”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=557026.msg4076590#msg4076590 date=1344897337]
typical donor based economy. Just from looking at “sandys shop” you can tell it’s either

a) a staff shop
b) a donor shop

when you make items only mainstreamed via the donors then there is no real economy. (because they can set outrageous prices that nobody can afford )
[/quote]This[/quote]

Isn’t that called a player owned shop?

Read full topic
